rect.style: fill: rgba(0, 128, 255, 0.3); stroke: navy; stroke-width: 3; stroke-dasharray: 4, 2; filter: drop-shadow(2px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.4));

circle.style: fill: rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5); stroke: black; stroke-width: 4; fill-opacity: 0.8; opacity: 0.9; transform: rotate(15deg); transform-origin: 140px 50px;

ellipse.style: fill: yellow; stroke: orange; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 6, 4; paint-order: stroke fill;

line.style: stroke: green; stroke-width: 5; stroke-linecap: round; marker-start: url(#arrowhead); marker-end: url(#arrowhead);
